I've just reviewed the most open-sciency Comm & #ica21 paper ever:

- Data shared
- Power-analysis based on SESOI
- Preregistered
- Shared #rstats & #rmarkdown code

Plus: 
- Separation of within & between effects
- Multi-level modeling
- Assumptions tested

Wow. Truly impressed.

Full-screen @rstudio recording tip for teaching Shiny / dataviz / anything involving recreating something in #rstats w/o switching windows:

- take a screenshot of thing to recreate
- embed screenshot in Rmd with chunk output inline
- code in a different tab and flip back & forth https://t.co/wdE4fm58dl
